body_html: Hmm, are you sure you want self.assertShapeEqual(p_sparemax, tf_sparsemax_op) and not self.assertShapeEqual(p_sparemax, tf_sparsemax_out) there? I though you want to compare the numpy shapes? I'm very curious if the grad_func helps solve some performance problems!
body_text: Hmm, are you sure you want self.assertShapeEqual(p_sparemax, tf_sparsemax_op) and not self.assertShapeEqual(p_sparemax, tf_sparsemax_out) there? I though you want to compare the numpy shapes? I'm very curious if the grad_func helps solve some performance problems!
body: Hmm, are you sure you want `self.assertShapeEqual(p_sparemax, tf_sparsemax_op)` and not `self.assertShapeEqual(p_sparemax, tf_sparsemax_out)` there? I though you want to compare the numpy shapes? I'm very curious if the grad_func helps solve some performance problems!
